title: slacker round-up
body: <p>I've been busy at work and at home so I haven't had much of a chance to write about anything interesting, so here's a 2 minute round up of everything that I had flagged in my RSS reader for the past few months...</p><dl><dt>2005-11-21</dt><dd><a href="http://www.tomshardware.com/">THG</a>'s <a href="http://www.twitchguru.com/">TwitchGuru</a>: <a href="http://www.twitchguru.com/2005/11/21/the_suicide_girls_tell_us_what_gets_them_going/">The Suicide Girls Tell Us What Gets Them Going</a><blockquote>"OK open mic. What do you want game developers to know when they make the next blockbuster game?<br /><br />Al Suicide : MAKE. A F******G. SIDESCROLLER."</blockquote></dd><dd><a href="http://us.gizmodo.com/gadgets/portable-media/2010-apples-flash-storage-odyssey-138519.php">Gizmodo: Apple's monopolistic flash memory practices</a></dd><dt>2005-11-15</dt><dd><a href="http://us.gizmodo.com/gadgets/home-entertainment/tivo-movie-rentals-service-137445.php">Gizmodo: TiVo's Video-On-Demand debut: Red Trousers</a></dd><dt>2005-11-11</dt><dd><a href="http://www.lifehacker.com/software/disk-recovery/why-you-need-a-linux-live-cd-136639.php">Lifehacker: Help2Go: linux live CD for hard-core windows repairs</a></dd><dt>2005-11-08</dt><dd><a href="http://www.lifehacker.com/software/extension/save-embedded-files-with-download-embedded-135757.php">Lifehacker: Firefox extension: Download Embedded content</a></dd><dt>2005-11-04</dt><dd><a href="http://www.lifehacker.com/software/habits/find-what-youve-lost-135318.php">Lifehacker: finding lost stuff</a></dd><dt>2005-10-20</dt><dd><a href="http://hybrids.autoblog.com/entry/1234000033064205/">Hybrids.Autoblog: Subaru's Turbo Hybrid Wagon concept: B5-TPH (AWD of course)</a></dd><dt>2005-10-19</dt><dd><a href="http://www.treehugger.com/files/2005/10/hondas_improved.php">Treehugger: Honda's sweet fuel-cell concept: FCX</a></dd><dt>2005-10-02</dt><dd><a href="http://www.codinghorror.com/blog/archives/000405.html">CodingHorror: BootSkin: Change Windows XP's boot screen</a></dd><dt>2005-09-30</dt><dd><a href="http://www.hanselman.com/blog/PermaLink,guid,5ba0d29d-6c5e-4f9a-84c9-071b546601ae.aspx">Scott Hanselman: Boo [.Net]: C# + Python + Ruby + CLR = interesting language</a></dd></dl><p>...that's all for now. Should be enough to keep busy until I find something cool enough to write about (and have the time to write about it).</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2005-11-21

slacker round-up

I've been busy at work and at home so I haven't had much of a chance to write about anything interesting, so here's a 2 minute round up of everything that I had flagged in my RSS reader for the past few months...

2005-11-21

OK open mic. What do you want game developers to know when they make the next blockbuster game?

Al Suicide : MAKE. A F******G. SIDESCROLLER.
